snippet: The tech giant probably won’t bring all production to the United States, as Donald Trump has suggested, but it provides diverse opportunities for thousands of Americans, along with a ladder to climb....
abstract: Apple counters criticism about manufacturing its products in China by pointing to its position as one of largest employers of American labor; tech firm directly employs 80,000 people nationwide, including 6,000 at its newest campus in central Texas, and offers workers decent pay, medical benefits and other perks.
lead_paragraph: The tech giant probably won’t bring all production to the United States, as Donald Trump has suggested, but it provides diverse opportunities for thousands of Americans, along with a ladder to climb.

headline.main: How Apple Empowers, and Employs, the American Working Class
headline.print_headline: How Apple Empowers, and Employs, the American Working Class
